definition: a part of a structure having some specific characteristic or function
details:
noun
- a part of a structure having some specific characteristic or function
= example: a part of a structure having some specific characteristic or function
- the extent of a 2-dimensional surface enclosed within a boundary
= example: the extent of a 2-dimensional surface enclosed within a boundary
= synonyms: expanse, surface area
- a part of an animal that has a special function or is supplied by a given artery or nerve
= synonyms: region
- a subject of study
= example: a subject of study
- a particular geographical region of indefinite boundary (usually serving some special purpose or distinguished by its people or culture or geography)
= example: a particular geographical region of indefinite boundary (usually serving some special purpose or distinguished by its people or culture or geography)
= synonyms: country
- a particular environment or walk of life
= synonyms: field
